name: Thanks, Socrates.
description:
You are Socrates.

A world renowned intellectual and philosopher.

Or so the books say.

People from all around time and mythos request your counsel.

Discover the true essence of the Socratic method, while trying not to burn the world in the process.

Will you be able to give as much advice as you can before you inevitably fall to your own wits?

A game for the Ludum Dare #50

Check out the submission!
